Package ides.api.core

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Annotable
    Interface for objects which can be dynamically annotated by other parts of the code.
    OptionsPane
    The interface for modules that will appear in the Options dialog box.
    UserInterface
    Interface for the services provided by the main window interface.
    Workspace
    Interface for the main manager (workspace) of DESModels in IDES.
    WorkspaceSubscriber
    Implemented by classes that wish to receive change notifications from the Workspace.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Hub
    The main hub of the program.
    PersistentProperties
    A convenience wrapper of Properties.
    WorkspaceMessage
    Message sent by Workspace to classes that implement WorkspaceSubscriber i.e.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    IncompleteWorkspaceDescriptorException
    The data needed to construct a WorkspaceDescriptor is incomplete.
